trans-unit.source: Represents a viewport for a paginated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> class.
The maximum size that the page view should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 보기가 자신과 자식을 정렬하는 데 사용할 최대 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content to fit a specified view size.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 뷰 크기에 맞도록 콘텐츠를 정렬합니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual size that the page view used to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 보기가 자신과 자식을 정렬하는 데 사용한 실제 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned size will always be less than or equal to the specified `finalSize`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 되는 크기는 항상 더 낮은 같거나 지정 된 `finalSize`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" />.
Call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> after finished using each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> instance.

After <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> is released for garbage collection and should no longer be referenced by the application.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> 호출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 가비지 수집에 대 한 해제 되 고 응용 프로그램에서 더 이상 참조할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> and being released, the garbage collector can reclaim the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> memory and resources.
trans-unit.target: 호출한 후 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> 가비지 수집기가 회수할 수 해제 되 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 메모리 및 리소스.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> as the final call to release each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> instance.
trans-unit.target: 항상 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> 각 해제에 대 한 마지막 호출으로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> is not called, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> is using will not be freed until the garbage collector later calls the page viewer's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> 를 호출 하지 않은 리소스는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> 가 사용 하 여 해제 되지 것입니다 가비지 수집기는 나중에 페이지 뷰어 호출 될 때까지 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage" /> associated with this view.
The document page associated with this view.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> used to retrieve content pages for this view.
trans-unit.target: 이 뷰에 대해 콘텐츠 페이지를 검색하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The paginator that retrieves content pages for this view.
trans-unit.target: 이 뷰에 대해 콘텐츠 페이지를 검색하는 페이지 지정자입니다.

trans-unit.source: The type of service object to get.
Gets the service object of the specified type.
A service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 형식의 서비스 개체이거나 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 형식의 서비스 개체가 없는 경우 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.GetService%2A> returns any services that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> provides if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.GetService%2A> 모든 서비스를 반환 합니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> 제공 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> 구현 <xref:System.IServiceProvider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the visual child to return.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> child at a specified index.
The visual child at the specified index.
`index` must be between 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.VisualChildrenCount%2A>-1.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero, or greater than or equal to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.VisualChildrenCount" />.
Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose" /> has been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스에 대해 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose" />가 호출되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose" /> has been called for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose" />에 대해 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" />가 호출되었으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The maximum available size.
Returns the available viewport size that can be given to display the current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage" />.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage" />에서 표시하도록 제공할 수 있는 사용 가능한 뷰포트 크기를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual desired size.
The returned size is always equal to or less than the given `availableSize`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 크기는 항상 작은 보다는 주어진 `availableSize`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" />.
The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.
The available size that the parent can give to the child.
trans-unit.target: 부모가 자식에 제공할 수 있는 사용 가능한 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is soft constraint.
The DocumentPageView's desired size.
Invoked when the DPI setting for the document page view is changed.
trans-unit.target: 문서 페이지 보기에 대한 DPI 설정이 변경될 때 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage" /> is connected.
Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> element of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage" /> is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage" /> 요소 연결이 끊어질 때 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page number of the current page displayed.
trans-unit.target: 현재 표시된 페이지의 페이지 번호를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the current page displayed.
trans-unit.target: 현재 표시된 페이지의 페이지 번호(0부터 시작)입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber%2A> is zero-based: 0 is the first page, 1 is the second page, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber%2A> 0부터 시작: 0은 첫 번째 페이지, 1은 두 번째 페이지입니다.

trans-unit.source: No content is displayed if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber%2A> is set to a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 아무 내용도 표시 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber%2A> 는 음수로 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Stretch" /> enumeration that specifies how content should be stretched to fill the display page.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠를 표시 페이지에 맞게 늘이는 방법을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Stretch" /> 열거형을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value that specifies how content should be stretched to fill the display page.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠를 표시 페이지에 맞게 늘이는 방법을 지정하는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Stretch.Uniform" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`

Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection" /> enumeration that specifies in what scaling directions <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch" /> should be applied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection" />에 적용할 크기 조정 방향을 지정하는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch" /> 열거형을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value that specifies in what scaling directions <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch" /> should be applied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch" />에 적용할 크기 조정 방향을 지정하는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection.DownOnly" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.StretchDirection" /> dependency property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch" /> dependency property.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose" /> method instead.
An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 가져올 서비스 개체의 형식을 지정하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.GetService(System.Type)" /> method instead.
A service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
Gets the number of visual children contained in this view.
trans-unit.target: 이 뷰에 포함된 시각적 자식의 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of visual children contained in this view.
trans-unit.target: 이 뷰에 포함된 시각적 자식의 수입니다.
